Text:
Complete with front cover and a rear cover I made myself.
Sorry track 5 is only the demo, 30 seconds long but the rest of the album is great !!!

No passwords required, no spam, no virus. Just great music.
Please leave me your comments and if anyone has got a full copy of sweet talk (track 5) please seed.

Thanks
Why the 2 .wav files? great seed otherwise! :)
Sorry ..forgot to check all files were MP3 format before seeding.... got excited!!
No, it's not a great seed. A demo isn't good enough. And don't add your own songs and call them a part of the album.
This is much better than all the fakes out there. I would like LTBOTS non demo but oh well. All the other torrents out there are fakes.....
Who cares if he added a few other B-Sides that he had, that only makes it a better B-Sides album. All of them are there! Thanks for putting this up man!

What album was "tranquilize" a part of? 
Is there a third album I don't know about?
I recognize some of these songs from Sam's Town and Hot Fuss.
great upload wobble,  excuse the little 1 celled twat that is reaperman for making a complete ass of himself & if he dont like it he can go buy it.
